projects.description:
Web platform for the company **Level Plus** (connecting companies and seniors seeking employment in Geneva), designed during my work-study program at Makeprops ❤. 

The app allows talents to complete a profile, participate in events, and receive job search follow-ups. It also includes a back office for administrators, managers, and speakers with a **&permission management** system, templates, and **&automatic email sending**.

projects.description:
Showcase website for my school, the **MMI department of IUT Chambéry**. The site presents the training programs, some student projects, and was built in 2 weeks. It is built with WordPress using a **&custom theme** and the **&ACF** plugin for content management. 

Designed like a computer interface, the site includes draggable windows and icons. Each window is an ACF block, making the entire site fully administrable.

projects.description:
Command-line tool developed for **Makeprops** during my work-study. It allows the generation of project templates to ease the creation of new projects (**makeprops templates create**). 

This internal project is published as a **&private npm package**. It is developed using **&Object-Oriented Programming** and designed to be modular and extensible. It also comes with documentation.

projects.description:
**&Private streaming server** for my grandfather, allowing him to access his personal movie collection accumulated over the years. 

The infrastructure is secured with **&strict network rules** (whitelist, additional authentication layer, WireGuard tunnel) and custom configuration. The app was customized for ease of use, and files are automatically compressed with **&scripts** for performance optimization.

projects.description:
Connected mosquito trap, developed as part of a student project. It captures and counts mosquitoes via a web app. 

The project includes a physical device with a **&microcontroller** and multiple sensors (optical fork, temperature, CO2...) as well as a web app for viewing data and capture statistics. It is designed to be accessible and easy to use. Communication is done via **&MQTT over the LoraWAN network**.
